Class Army

  • java.lang.Object
    • Army
  • public class Army
extends java.lang.Object
    Army - class for creating and managing the armies in their simulated battle
    Author:
    Caleb Richardson

    • Constructor Detail

      • Army

        public Army​(int armySize,
            java.lang.String armyName,
            java.lang.String music,
            java.lang.String warType,
            java.lang.String special,
            int alliance)
        Army - army constructor
        Parameters:
        armySize - - size of the army to be created
        armyName - - name of the army to be constructed
        music - - music to play upon victory for this army
        warType - - type of warriors within the army
        special - - type of special warrior(s) in the army
        alliance - - sets which alliance the members of the army are apart of

      • victory

        public Audio victory​(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> battleUpdates,
                     BattleSim battle)
        victory - executes a victory sequence that includes displaying a victory message and playing the corresponding victory music for each army
        Parameters:
        battleUpdates - - the list of text updates that are being shared with the user
        Returns:
        - the audio file created so the BattleSim class can mute it and stop it accordingly

      • drawVictory

                        int yPos)
        drawVictory - draws the appropriate victory image for the current army
        Parameters:
        g - - a graphics2D object
        xPos - - the x position at which to draw the image
        yPos - - the y position at which to draw the image
